GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-35N 006-44E AT 222140Z MAR.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG AND TO
   IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER, PHONE: 603 2031 0014,
   FAX: 603 2078 5769, E-MAIL: PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 292317Z MAR 18.
